item.title: Cooking up VR with I-chih
item.author: andershurum@gmail.com (@peakbreaker)
item.description: Just a heads up dear reader - My posts have two parts. The first part is a personal story and the second part is purely about technology and code – If youre here just for code snippets, then scroll down – This is I-chih (she is the one to the left) She is very concerned about the environment, and rightfully so - its an important issue. We first met back in 2017 at a clothe swapping party - back then it was after I opened a grocery store in Bergen, and I really needed some pants.
